overview:
Dan is the CTO at TextMarks, and has been professionally programming video games since the Internet was first established.

After college Dan co-founded a video game development company in San Francisco. The team soon shifted focus to start up BITMO, providing cross-platform wireless commerce and communications solutions to businesses. BITMO merged with MobileSys which was later acquired by mBlox, a leading global mobile transaction network. Recently, Dan has consulted for video game and web companies, using enterprise development experience to integrate the two. Staying abreast of evolving new technologies, Dan once again found the wireless revolution to be today’s sweet spot.
